verses.verse: And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> came unto me, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H7760>set<s%> thy <S%H6440>face<s%> against <S%H1463>Gog<s%>, the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4031>Magog<s%>, the <S%H7218>chief<s%> <S%H5387>prince<s%> of <S%H4902>Meshech<s%> and <S%H8422>Tubal<s%>, and <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> against him, the chief: or, prince of the chief

And <S%H559>say<s%>, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>; Behold, I am against thee, O <S%H1463>Gog<s%>, the <S%H7218>chief<s%> <S%H5387>prince<s%> of <S%H4902>Meshech<s%> and <S%H8422>Tubal<s%>:

And I will turn thee <S%H7725>back<s%>, and <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H2397>hooks<s%> into thy <S%H3895>jaws<s%>, and I will bring thee <S%H3318>forth<s%>, and all thine <S%H2428>army<s%>, <S%H5483>horses<s%> and <S%H6571>horsemen<s%>, all of them <S%H3847>clothed<s%> with all <S%H4358>sorts<s%> of armour, even a <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H6951>company<s%> with <S%H6793>bucklers<s%> and <S%H4043>shields<s%>, all of them <S%H8610>handling<s%> <S%H2719>swords<s%>:
<S%H6539>Persia<s%>, <S%H3568>Ethiopia<s%>, and <S%H6316>Libya<s%> with them; all of them with <S%H4043>shield<s%> and <S%H3553>helmet<s%>: Libya: or, Phut

<S%H1586>Gomer<s%>, and all his <S%H102>bands<s%>; the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H8425>Togarmah<s%> of the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H3411>quarters<s%>, and all his <S%H102>bands<s%>: and <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> with thee.
Be thou <S%H3559>prepared<s%>, and <S%H3559>prepare<s%> for thyself, thou, and all thy <S%H6951>company<s%> that are <S%H6950>assembled<s%> unto thee, and be thou a <S%H4929>guard<s%> unto them.

After <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> thou shalt be <S%H6485>visited<s%>: in the <S%H319>latter<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> thou shalt <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> that is brought <S%H7725>back<s%> from the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, and is <S%H6908>gathered<s%> out of <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%>, against the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, which have been <S%H8548>always<s%> <S%H2723>waste<s%>: but it is brought <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H5971>nations<s%>, and they shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H983>safely<s%> all of them.

Thou shalt <S%H5927>ascend<s%> and <S%H935>come<s%> like a <S%H7722>storm<s%>, thou shalt be like a <S%H6051>cloud<s%> to <S%H3680>cover<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>, thou, and all thy <S%H102>bands<s%>, and <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> with thee.

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>; It shall also come to pass, that at the same <S%H3117>time<s%> shall <S%H1697>things<s%> <S%H5927>come<s%> into thy <S%H3824>mind<s%>, and thou shalt <S%H2803>think<s%> an <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H4284>thought<s%>: think: or, conceive a mischievous purpose

And thou shalt <S%H559>say<s%>, I will go <S%H5927>up<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of unwalled <S%H6519>villages<s%>; I will <S%H935>go<s%> to them that are at <S%H8252>rest<s%>, that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H983>safely<s%>, all of them <S%H3427>dwelling<s%> without <S%H2346>walls<s%>, and having neither <S%H1280>bars<s%> nor <S%H1817>gates<s%>, safely: or, confidently

To <S%H7997>take<s%> a <S%H7998>spoil<s%>, and to <S%H962>take<s%> a <S%H957>prey<s%>; to <S%H7725>turn<s%> thine <S%H3027>hand<s%> upon the desolate <S%H2723>places<s%> that are now <S%H3427>inhabited<s%>, and upon the <S%H5971>people<s%> that are <S%H622>gathered<s%> out of the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, which have <S%H6213>gotten<s%> <S%H4735>cattle<s%> and <S%H7075>goods<s%>, that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H2872>midst<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>. To take: Heb. To spoil the spoil, and to prey the prey midst: Heb. navel

<S%H7614>Sheba<s%>, and <S%H1719>Dedan<s%>, and the <S%H5503>merchants<s%> of <S%H8659>Tarshish<s%>, with all the young <S%H3715>lions<s%> thereof, shall <S%H559>say<s%> unto thee, Art thou <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H7997>take<s%> a <S%H7998>spoil<s%>? hast thou <S%H6950>gathered<s%> thy <S%H6951>company<s%> to <S%H962>take<s%> a <S%H957>prey<s%>? to carry <S%H5375>away<s%> <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H2091>gold<s%>, to take <S%H3947>away<s%> <S%H4735>cattle<s%> and <S%H7075>goods<s%>, to <S%H7997>take<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7998>spoil<s%>?

Therefore, <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H1463>Gog<s%>, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>; In that <S%H3117>day<s%> when my <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3427>dwelleth<s%> <S%H983>safely<s%>, shalt thou not <S%H3045>know<s%> it?

And thou shalt <S%H935>come<s%> from thy <S%H4725>place<s%> out of the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H3411>parts<s%>, thou, and <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> with thee, all of them <S%H7392>riding<s%> upon <S%H5483>horses<s%>, a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H6951>company<s%>, and a <S%H7227>mighty<s%> <S%H2428>army<s%>:

And thou shalt come <S%H5927>up<s%> against my <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, as a <S%H6051>cloud<s%> to <S%H3680>cover<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>; it shall be in the <S%H319>latter<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>, and I will <S%H935>bring<s%> thee against my <S%H776>land<s%>, that the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> may <S%H3045>know<s%> me, when I shall be <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> in thee, O <S%H1463>Gog<s%>, before their <S%H5869>eyes<s%>.

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>; Art thou he of whom I have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> in <S%H6931>old<s%> <S%H3117>time<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> my <S%H5650>servants<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, which <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> in those <S%H3117>days<s%> many <S%H8141>years<s%> that I would <S%H935>bring<s%> thee against them? by: Heb. by the hand of

And it shall come to pass at the same <S%H3117>time<s%> <S%H3117>when<s%> <S%H1463>Gog<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> against the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>, that my <S%H2534>fury<s%> shall come <S%H5927>up<s%> in my <S%H639>face<s%>.

For in my <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> and in the <S%H784>fire<s%> of my <S%H5678>wrath<s%> have I <S%H1696>spoken<s%>, Surely in that <S%H3117>day<s%> there shall be a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7494>shaking<s%> in the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>;

So that the <S%H1709>fishes<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%>, and the <S%H5775>fowls<s%> of the <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, and the <S%H2416>beasts<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%>, and all creeping <S%H7431>things<s%> that <S%H7430>creep<s%> upon the <S%H127>earth<s%>, and all the <S%H120>men<s%> that are upon the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H127>earth<s%>, shall <S%H7493>shake<s%> at my <S%H6440>presence<s%>, and the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> shall be thrown <S%H2040>down<s%>, and the steep <S%H4095>places<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%>, and every <S%H2346>wall<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> to the <S%H776>ground<s%>. steep: or, towers, or, stairs

And I will <S%H7121>call<s%> for a <S%H2719>sword<s%> against him throughout all my <S%H2022>mountains<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>: every <S%H376>man's<s%> <S%H2719>sword<s%> shall be against his <S%H251>brother<s%>.

And I will <S%H8199>plead<s%> against him with <S%H1698>pestilence<s%> and with <S%H1818>blood<s%>; and I will <S%H4305>rain<s%> upon him, and upon his <S%H102>bands<s%>, and upon the <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> that are with him, an <S%H7857>overflowing<s%> <S%H1653>rain<s%>, and great <S%H417>hailstones<s%> <S%H68><s%>, <S%H784>fire<s%>, and <S%H1614>brimstone<s%>.

Thus will I <S%H1431>magnify<s%> myself, and <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> myself; and I will be <S%H3045>known<s%> in the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%>, and they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.
